00020 // Wrapper for bifurcated gaussian plus argus pdf.

00036 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00037 BdkPdfBifurArgus::BdkPdfBifurArgus() : _fracBifur(0) {
00038   // Default Constructor:
00039   addComponents();
00040 }
00041 
00042 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00043 BdkPdfBifurArgus::BdkPdfBifurArgus(const char * theName,
00044                                    const char * theDesc,
00045                                    RooRealVar & dependent)  : _fracBifur(0) {
00046   // Initializing Constructor:
00047   addComponents();
00048   init(theName, theDesc, dependent);
00049 }
00050 
00051 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00052 BdkPdfBifurArgus::~BdkPdfBifurArgus() {
00053   // Destructor:
00054   deleteFrac();
00055 }

00059 // Dummy copy constructor:
00060     cout << "BdkPdfBifurArgus::BdkPdfBifurArgus -- dummy copy constructor"
00061          << endl;

00065 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00066 void BdkPdfBifurArgus::init(const char * theName,
00067                             const char * theDesc,
00068                             RooRealVar & dependent) {
00069   // Initializer:
00070   _fracBifur = 0;
00071 
00072   SetName(theName);
00073   SetTitle(theDesc);
00074 
00075   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00076   setDependent(dependent);
00077   initParameters();
00078 }
00079 
00080 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00081 void BdkPdfBifurArgus::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00082   // Sets the dependent variable:
00083   _dependent = &dependent;
00084   _bifur.setDependent(dependent);
00085   _argus.setDependent(dependent);
00086 
00087   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00088 }
00089 
00090 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00091 void BdkPdfBifurArgus::initParameters() {
00092   // Initializes the contained RRV's and PDF wrappers:
00093   _fracBifur = new RooRealVar(GetName() + TString(".fracBifur"),
00094                               GetTitle () + TString(" fracBifur"),
00095                               0.8, 0, 1);
00096 
00097   _fracBifur->setError(0.02);
00098 
00099   _bifur.init(GetName() + TString(".bifur"), 
00100               GetTitle() + TString(" BifurGauss"), 
00101               *_dependent);
00102 
00103   _argus.init(GetName() + TString(".argus"), 
00104               GetTitle() + TString(" Argus"), 
00105               *_dependent);
00106 }
00107 
00108 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00109 void BdkPdfBifurArgus::createPdf() {
00110   // Builds the PDF. The PDFs of the contained wrappers are automatically built
00111   _thePdf = new RooAddPdf(GetName() + TString(".thePdf"), 
00112                           GetTitle() + TString(" thePdf"), 
00113                           *_bifur.getPdf(), 
00114                           *_argus.getPdf(),
00115                           *_fracBifur);
00116 
00117   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00118 }
00119 
00120 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00121 void BdkPdfBifurArgus::deleteFrac() {
00122   // Deletes pointers:
00123   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00124   if ( _fracBifur != 0 )   delete _fracBifur;
00125 }
00126 
00127 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00128 void BdkPdfBifurArgus::addComponents() {
00129   // Adds the wrappers to the composite's list:
00130   addComponent(_bifur);
00131   addComponent(_argus);
00132 }
00133 
00134 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00135 void BdkPdfBifurArgus::linkParameters(RooRealVar * mean,
00136                                       RooRealVar * sigl, 
00137                                       RooRealVar * sigr,
00138                                       RooRealVar * endPoint, 
00139                                       RooRealVar * exp,
00140                                       RooRealVar * fracB) {
00141   // Copies RRV pointers:
00142   _bifur.linkParameters(mean, sigl, sigr);
00143   _argus.linkParameters(endPoint, exp);
00144 
00145   if (0 != fracB) {
00146     _fracBifur = fracB;
00147     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00148   }
00149 }
